Class DataNeo4jAutoConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.data.neo4j.autoconfigure.DataNeo4jAutoConfiguration
@AutoConfiguration(before=TransactionAutoConfiguration.class, after={Neo4jAutoConfiguration.class,TransactionManagerCustomizationAutoConfiguration.class}) @ConditionalOnClass({org.neo4j.driver.Driver.class,org.springframework.data.neo4j.core.transaction.Neo4jTransactionManager.class,PlatformTransactionManager.class}) @EnableConfigurationProperties(DataNeo4jProperties.class) @ConditionalOnBean(org.neo4j.driver.Driver.class) public final class DataNeo4jAutoConfiguration extends Object
Auto-configuration for Spring Data Neo4j.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Michael Hunger, Josh Long, Vince Bickers, Stephane Nicoll, Kazuki Shimizu, Michael J. Simons
